issue.title: [C++] Implement task-based model into the executable-pipelines.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14444](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14444). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The plan fragments will use a task-based model for parallel processing.
 That means that there is a scheduler that gets assigned tasks for execution, keeps selecting the next task for execution, and assigning it to a specific executor (aka arrow thread pool).
